name: AstroDrift
description:
Are You Ready To Slide To The Stars? (Please Read Full Description Before Playing) Controls: Use the mouse to aim the StarShip. Clicking the left mouse button will fire the booster The greater the distance from  the mouse, the harder the booster will   fire Use the scroll wheel to zoom in and out. Objectives: Maintain a connection to base stations long enough for them to open. Broken connections result in signal loss. Successfully landing earns an extra life. A mysterious final challenge awaits!   

  

Music Used: Song: Teyeq - Pull Me Down [NCS Release]
Music provided by NoCopyrightSounds
Free Download/Stream: http://ncs.io/PullMeDown
